headline: Has Vulcan Materials (VMC) Run Too Far After Its Multi‑Year Share Price Rally
summary: If you are wondering whether Vulcan Materials is still reasonably priced after its strong run, or if most of the value is already on the table, this article is for you. The stock last closed at US$310.00, with returns of 1.5% over 7 days, 3.1% over 30 days, 5.9% year to date, 26.3% over 1 year, 73.4% over 3 years and 92.3% over 5 years. These figures naturally raise questions about what is already priced in. Recent headlines around Vulcan Materials have largely focused on its role as a key...
